# Data and modeling

> Documentation for Data and modeling.

*Topics available: 624*

- [Data and modeling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/index.md): View links to articles that describe modeling and how to access data in .NET. The articles cover WCF Data Services, ADO.NET, and transaction processing.

## Subtopics

- [ADO.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/llms.txt): Topics available: 606; ADO.NET documentation and reference.
- [Transaction Processing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/transactions/llms.txt): Topics available: 17; Transaction Processing documentation and reference.
